Actually the main reason to build nuclear powerplants is not cheap energy, as it is not so cheap in the long term, but to obtain plutonium for nuclear arms. This is why the countries wich have a nuclear arsenal have so many noclear power plants. Countries without nuclear arsenal still build nuclear power plants in order to get in toch with the technology and be able at some day to build nuclear arms. Another reason is, of course, the prestige of being a country so advanced that it has nuclear power plants.

Because this story never was true. It would be economical nonsense to do it, and the (also nuclear) waste volume created by it would just grow. Neither „Transmutation“ nor „nuclear recycling“ will solve any of the problems of nuclear fission. That is not true, there is one solution: just stop producing more nuclear waste every day and use much cheaper and cleaner renewable energy. Nuclear fission was an error to begin with, it was mainly done for military reasons on a scale that had to be sold to the public. It always was uneconomical expensive, unpractical and dangerous, as proven several times in history.

summary.llm_summary:
Summary:

1. The main topics being discussed in the comments are related to appreciation for the video itself, with users expressing their gratitude by repeatedly saying "great video" and "cheers".
2. The overall sentiment is overwhelmingly positive, with all comments conveyed a sense of approval and admiration.
3. There does not appear to be any notable patterns, recurring questions, or spam-like behavior in the provided comments.
